<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770205343</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Voicing Your Views: Letter to the Editor</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Äußern Ihrer Ansichten: Leserbrief</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Exprimer Vos Vues : Lettre à l'éditeur</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Exprimindo Suas Vistas: Letra ao editor</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Espressione Dei Vostri Punti di vista: 
Lettera all'editore</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Έκφραση των όψεών σας: Επιστολή στον 
επεξεργαστή</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Expresar Sus Opiniones: Carta al editor</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Students will explore the editorial section of the newspaper and understand what it is.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Social Sciences</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Arts</string>
          </keyword>
          <coverage>
            <string language="en">North America</string>
          </coverage>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Kursteilnehmer erforschen das redaktionelle 
Kapitel der Zeitung und verstehen, was es ist.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Les étudiants exploreront la section éditoriale 
du journal et comprendront ce qu'est il.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Os estudantes explorarão a seção editorial do 
jornal e compreenderão o que é.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Gli allievi esploreranno la sezione editoriale del
giornale e capiranno che cosa è.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Οι σπουδαστές θα ερευνήσουν το εκδοτικό τμήμα της 
εφημερίδας και θα καταλάβουν τι είναι.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Los estudiantes explorarán la sección editorial 
del periódico y entenderán cuáles es.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Sozialwissenschaften</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Künste</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Les Sciences Sociales</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Arts</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ciências Sociais</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Artes</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Scienze Sociali</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Arti</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Κοινωνικές επιστήμες</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Τέχνες</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ciencias Sociales</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Artes</string>
          </keyword>
